version_description:
Create Surfshark VPN account directly from Trust DNS app.
DNS changer added. Now you can choose from 100+ DNS servers (Many DNS over HTTPS, DNSCrypt and DNS over TLS)
Bug fixes

Even better flow that allows you to add custom DNS server
Better experience to pick from 100+ DNS servers (including dnssec, dnscrypt, DoT, DoH), use free public DNS providers or your own.
More DNS servers to enjoy multiple benefits - ad blocking, malware protection, parental control & more.
Less promo for Surfshark sign-up.
Bug fixes.
